text: The Boat Races may refer to: * The Boat Race and The Women's Boat Race, annual rowing competitions between the universities of Cambridge and Oxford which, since 2015, are held on the same day and course on the Tideway of the River Thames in London * Henley Boat Races, annual rowing competitions held at Henley-on-Thames between men's and women's lightweight and college crews from the universities of Cambridge and Oxford (which, prior to 2015, included The Women's Boat Race) ==See also== * The Boat Races 2015 Category:Rowing at the University of Cambridge Category:Rowing at the University of Oxford
title: The Boat Races
